title: ICE: generic_const_exprs: ´assertion failed: self.errors_reported`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(generic_const_exprs)] pub fn main() {} impl EntriesBuffer { fn a(&self) -> impl Iterator { self.0.iter_mut() } } struct EntriesBuffer(Box<[[u8; HashesEntryLEN]; 5]>); ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (22f247c6f 2023-03-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 22f247c6f3ed388cb702d01c2ff27da658a8b353 commit-date: 2023-03-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0425]: cannot find value `HashesEntryLEN` in this scope --> treereduce.out:10:32 | 10 | struct EntriesBuffer(Box<[[u8; HashesEntryLEN]; 5]>); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ not found in this scope ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: self.errors_reported', compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/mod.rs:533:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f389356651a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h1ac6254167c780d9 at /rustc/22f247c6f3ed388cb702d01c2ff27da658a8b353/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f389356651a -
